mapper.insert:
select max(board_group)+1 from board
insert into board(bno,title,writer,updatedate,board_content,board_group,userId) values(seq_board.nextval,#{title},#{writer},sysdate,#{board_content},#{board_group},#{userId})
mapper.select: select *from board order by board_group DESC
mapper.update: update board set hits=hits+1 where bno=#{bno}
